body_html:
I've pushed changes and tests to allow different input and output sizes.
I've also added tests to make sure that zero-strided inputs are supported.

One thing to keep in mind is that CuDNN's Transformer API does not support zero-strided inputs. Hence, the best I am doing on the GPU side is:

if 0 in input.stride():
    input = input.contiguous()

If you are not under very high memory pressure, this should be okay (with the caching allocator and all, it should be unnoticeable).

body:
I've pushed changes and tests to allow different input and output sizes. 
I've also added tests to make sure that zero-strided inputs are supported.

One thing to keep in mind is that CuDNN's Transformer API does not support zero-strided inputs. Hence, the best I am doing on the GPU side is:
```
if 0 in input.stride():
    input = input.contiguous()
```

If you are not under very high memory pressure, this should be okay (with the caching allocator and all, it should be unnoticeable).
